trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 컨트롤에 웹 서버에 대 한 디자이너 호스트에서 디자인 타임 지원을 제공 하는 구성 요소에 대 한 기본 클래스를 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 호스트에서 사용자가 소스 뷰에서 디자인 뷰로 전환 하는 경우 컨트롤을 설명 하는 태그 소스 코드에서 파생 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>추상 클래스를 구문 분석 하 고 디자인 화면에 컨트롤의 디자인 타임 버전 생성 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 소스 뷰로 다시 전환 되는 경우 디자인 타임 컨트롤 태그 소스 코드에 유지 되 고 웹 페이지에 대 한 태그를 편집 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataListDesigner 추상 클래스에서 파생 된 컨트롤에 대 한 디자인 타임 지원을 제공 하는 구성 요소에 대 한 기본 클래스로 사용는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>한 디자이너 호스트에서.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataListDesigner 클래스 속성은 다음과 같은 기능을 제공:는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>속성 반환 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>개체에서 파생 된 개체는 일반적으로 포함 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>디자이너의 클래스는 상속 트리에서 각 수준에 대 한.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A>속성, 연결 된 컨트롤의 해당 속성에 대 한 액세스를 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>속성은 연결된 된 컨트롤의 데이터 원본 디자이너에 대 한 액세스를 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>속성 데이터 소스의 기본 뷰를 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataListDesigner 클래스 메서드는 다음 기능을 제공:- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>메서드를 표시, 편집 및 연결된 된 컨트롤을 디자인할 디자이너를 준비 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>메서드가 호출 하는 컨트롤에 대 한 구성 요소 편집기.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>메서드 추가, 제거 또는 연결된 된 컨트롤의 디자인 타임 속성 그림자를 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>메서드는 디자인 타임에 데이터 원본으로 사용할 수 있는 개체를 생성 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the container of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>메서드는 연결된 된 컨트롤의 컨테이너에서 데이터 소스를 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>메서드는 특정 데이터 멤버를 확인 하는 컨트롤 컨테이너에서 데이터 소스를 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method gets the data source of the template container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>메서드는 템플릿 컨테이너의 데이터 소스를 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>메서드 연결된 된 컨트롤에 변경 될 때 호출 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the associated control data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>연결 된 컨트롤 데이터 소스가 변경 된 경우 메서드는.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>메서드 연결 된 컨트롤 데이터 원본의 스키마가 변경 되 면 호출 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>자동 서식 구성표가 적용 된 경우 메서드는.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A>각각 템플릿 편집 디자이너 동사 변경 될 때 또는 연결 된 컨트롤 스타일 변경 될 때 발생 하는 기능을 구현 하는 메서드를 재정의할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>메서드가 속성 작성기 이벤트를 처리 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework의 새 인스턴스를 내부적으로 생성 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>에서 파생 되는 연결 된 컨트롤을 만들 때의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스 또는 디자인 화면에서 해당 컨트롤의 복사본입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 이 디자이너의 디자이너 작업 목록 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object and adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is returned by the ActionLists base property to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: ActionLists 속성 만들고 빈 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>개체는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>에이 ActionLists 기본 속성에 의해 반환 되는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>개체.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: Then it adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, and then returns this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 다음에 추가 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>개체를이 반환 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>개체입니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> 이 디자이너와 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data key field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤의 데이터 키 필드의 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataKeyField property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataKeyField 속성에 액세스할 수는 디자이너에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> 에서 파생 된 연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indicates the primary key of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>연결된 된 컨트롤에 바인딩되는 데이터 원본의 기본 키를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>연결된 된 컨트롤의 값입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data member field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤의 데이터 멤버 필드의 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataMember 속성에 액세스할 수는 디자이너에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> 에서 파생 된 연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indicates the table or element of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>테이블이 나 연결된 된 컨트롤에 바인딩되는 데이터 원본의 요소를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>연결된 된 컨트롤의 값입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data source property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤의 데이터 원본 속성의 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataSource 속성에 액세스할 수는 디자이너에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> 에서 파생 된 연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>연결된 된 컨트롤의 값입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 바인딩에 대 한 선택 된 경우 데이터 원본 디자이너를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner property returns the designer for the data source of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceDesigner 속성 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> 에서 파생 된 연결된 된 컨트롤의 데이터 원본에 대 한 디자이너를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The designer object implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너는 개체가 구현 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>인터페이스.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤의 데이터 원본에 대 한 디자이너입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다 디자이너의 버전의 데이터 원본 ID 속성을 가져오거나 설정 하 고 연결된 된 컨트롤의 해당 속성을 섀도 하는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting the designer's DataSourceID property causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control to be set.
trans-unit.target: 설정 디자이너의 DataSourceID 속성 하면은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 설정할 연결된 된 컨트롤의.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String>, indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceID로 설정 된 경우는 <xref:System.String>, 새 데이터 원본을 정의할 수를 나타내는 **데이터 원본 만들기** 대화 상자가 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String> indicating there is no data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> is set to an empty string ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에 바인딩된 데이터 소스의 기본 뷰를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerView property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 뷰 속성을 전달 하 여 연결된 된 컨트롤에 바인딩된 데이터 소스의 기본 뷰를 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>속성을는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no view is returned or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.
trans-unit.target: 뷰가 반환 되 면 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>속성이 설정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>보기를 가져오는 데 사용 됩니다 이름과 첫 번째 뷰 이름이 기본 보기를 가져오는 데 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> representing the default view of the data source.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the designer and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너에서 사용 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 하 고 선택적으로 관리 되는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, the Dispose method disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 컨트롤에서 파생 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스에는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>속성을 구현 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>연결을 끊습니다 인터페이스를 Dispose 메서드는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>개체.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> method, the Dispose disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>구현 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>메서드, Dispose 연결을 끊습니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, 및 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>이벤트.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose also disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 연결도 끊어지고는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: It finally calls the Dispose base method.
trans-unit.target: 마지막으로 Dispose 기본 메서드를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 파생 되는 컨트롤의 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref>를 구현 하는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a component editor for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에 대 한 구성 요소 편집기를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: The InvokePropertyBuilder method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: InvokePropertyBuilder 메서드를 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>개체를 다음 호출에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>메서드의 구성 요소 편집기.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: The index of the page with which to initialize the component editor.
trans-unit.target: 구성 요소 편집기를 초기화 하는 데 사용 하 여 페이지의 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormat method is obsolete and has no functionality.
trans-unit.target: OnAutoFormat 메서드 사용 되지 않으며 기능이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>이벤트를 발생 시킨.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에는 자동 서식 구성표가 적용 된 경우 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormatApplied method is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object is applied to the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: OnAutoFormatApplied 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>개체 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> 에서 파생 된 연결된 된 컨트롤에 적용 되</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> 는 경우

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> object that is applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>개체 정의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle>컨트롤에 적용 되는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>

trans-unit.source: A designer can override the OnAutoFormatApplied to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너는 컨트롤의 속성을 검사할 또는 다른 조치를 취할 OnAutoFormatApplied 재정의할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"></xref> object that defines a style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"> </xref> 스타일을 정의 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에 변경 될 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class executes.
trans-unit.target: OnComponentChanged 메서드를 호출한 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>에서 파생 된 컨트롤의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스를 실행 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: 이 컨트롤의 속성 변경에 대 한 응답에는 일반적으로 (예를 들어 한 **속성** 표 변경).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>컨트롤이 바인딩된 개체가 변경, 디자인 화면에 컨트롤을 다시 그리면.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>이벤트의 원본인.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에 대 한 데이터 원본 변경 될 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 파생 되는 연결 된 컨트롤을 연결 하는 OnDataSourceChanged 기본 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>현재 데이터 원본에 대 한 클래스 메서드 컨트롤이 연결 된 데이터 원본의 서로 다른 경우, 디자인 타임 태그를 업데이트 하 고.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: 속성 작성기 이벤트를 처리 하는 메서드를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnPropertyBuilder method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> 에서 파생 되는 연결 된 컨트롤에 대 한 구성 요소 편집기를 호출 하는 OnPropertyBuilder 메서드

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>개체를 다음 호출는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>메서드의 구성 요소 편집기.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>이벤트의 원본인.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에 대 한 데이터 원본의 스키마가 변경 될 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the OnSchemaRefreshed method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너가 템플릿 편집 모드 인지 또는 추가 되 고 필드나 OnSchemaRefreshed 메서드 호출을 편집 하지 않는 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>메서드를 호출 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>업데이트 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>컨트롤을 데이터 원본 변경 내용을 반영 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤의 스타일 변경 될 때 발생 하는 기능을 구현 하려면 재정의할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnStylesChanged method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has changed.
trans-unit.target: 파생 되는 스타일의 연결 된 컨트롤 알림 OnStylesChanged 메서드 사용 될 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스가 변경 되었습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.
trans-unit.target: 템플릿 편집 디자이너 동사 변경 될 때 발생 하는 기능을 구현 하려면 재정의할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.
trans-unit.target: 추가 처리를 수행 하도록 OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged 메서드를 구현할 수 있는, 기록 하는 등 변경 되었는지, 템플릿 편집 동사를 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 속성을 제거 또는 디스플레이 추가 속성을 추가 하는 디자이너에서 사용 된 **속성** 표 또는 연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성을 숨기 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 디자이너에서 파생 된 메서드를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>숨기려면 디자이너에서 구현 하는 해당 디자인 타임 속성을 사용 하 여 다양 한 컨트롤 속성 및 속성을 추가 하거나 속성을 제거 하는 메서드는 **속성** 눈금.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, the PreFilterProperties creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 컨트롤에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>클래스는 PreFilterProperties 디자인 타임 속성을 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 컬렉션 한 <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>추가 되 고 섀도 처리 된 속성의 인터페이스입니다.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
